name: mikroe.click.c6dofimu22
short_description: 6DOF IMU 22 Click is a compact add-on board for advanced motion tracking. This board features the ICM-42670-P, a high-performance 6-axis MEMS MotionTracking IMU from TDK InvenSense. The ICM-42670-P integrates a 3-axis gyroscope and accelerometer, offering exceptional precision in motion detection. It supports both I2C and SPI interfaces for communication, features a substantial 2.25Kbytes FIFO, and includes two programmable interrupts that enhance power efficiency through a wake-on-motion feature.
